head.supplied: ¶ [urges that new Edition of Vol on "Select Plants" be got ready in time for Indian & Colonial Exhibition ¶ ]...

div.p: No. 5582, vol. 1885 D, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria

Letter not found. Item is a register entry only, registering receipt on 2 June 1885 of a letter dated the same day. See also M to G. Berry, 22 January 1885; M to G. Berry, 23 February 1885; and T. Wilson to M, 26 February 1885 (in this edition as 85-02-26b).
[urges that new Edition of Vol on "Select Plants" be got ready in time for Indian & Colonial Exhibition
Indian and Colonial Exhibition, London, 1886. M's letter was referred to the Government Printer on 2 June 1885 minuted: 'To expedite matters'. A note indicates that the Printer replied on 5 June though without stating the nature of his response. The file was forwarded to M on 5 June minuted: 'For his information'. M acknowledged the minute on 9 June. M's suggestion was evidently approved, since the new edition was published later that year (B85.12.03). See also M to A. Deakin, 4 March 1886. ]
